comments.raw_text:
In Etherpad (exmple, http://etherpad.mozilla.org ) if the text is in rtl languages then the movement of keyboard arrows is reversed.
If I press the right cursor moves to the left.

It's very difficult to work in Hebrew, because it.

In chrome the corsur move correct.
comments.creator: amiadb@gmail.com
comments.author: amiadb@gmail.com
comments.text:
In Etherpad (exmple, http://etherpad.mozilla.org ) if the text is in rtl languages then the movement of keyboard arrows is reversed.
If I press the right cursor moves to the left.

It's very difficult to work in Hebrew, because it.

In chrome the corsur move correct.
Can you still reproduce this issue with current Firefox builds?
